Simple example
```vue
<template>
    <div class="pad-l5">
        <ui-wysiwyg-editor v-model="model" :autofocus="false" :editorContent="{ class: ['h-100', 'pad-3', 'scroll-y'] }"></ui-wysiwyg-editor>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiWysiwygEditor from './WysiwygEditor.vue';
export default {
    components: { UiWysiwygEditor },
    data: () => ({
        model: `<p>This WYSIWYG is based on 
        <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" href="https://tiptap.dev/" class="color-link">tiptap</a> 
        editor framework.</p>`
    })
};
</script>
```

Advanced example. Using custom tool groups, bubble menu and 'change' event instead of 'input' to update the model

```vue
<template>
    <div class="pad-l5">
        <ui-wysiwyg-editor
            v-bind="{
                value: model,
                tools,
                focusVisible: false,
                autofocus: false,
                bubbleMenu: true,
                editorContent: { class: ['h-100', 'pad-3', 'scroll-y'] }
            }"
            @change="onChange"></ui-wysiwyg-editor>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiWysiwygEditor from './WysiwygEditor.vue';
import { createTool, ToolType } from './constants';

export default {
    components: { UiWysiwygEditor },
    data: () => ({
        model: `<p><strong>select text</strong> to see a formatting menu pop up</p>`,
        tools: [
            {
                title: '',
                group: [
                    ToolType.UNDO,
                    ToolType.REDO,
                    ToolType.PARAGRAPH_STYLE,
                    ToolType.TEXT_COLOR,
                    createTool({
                        name: ToolType.HORIZONTAL_RULE,
                        icon: 'minus',
                        title: 'Вертикальный разделитель',
                        exec() {
                            this.editor.chain().focus().setHorizontalRule().run();
                        },
                        isEnabled() {
                            return this.editor.can().setHorizontalRule();
                        }
                    })
                ]
            }
        ]
    }),
    methods: {
        onChange(value) {
            this.model = value;
        }
    }
};
</script>
```
